title: THIS JOURNEY IS YOURS. PACE IT, OWN IT, PROGRESS WITH PURPOSE
description: Abhinav, your thoughtful approach and deep curiosity are your greatest assets as you refine your SAT skills. Your ability to connect ideas and understand the 'why' behind complex concepts, especially in reading and writing, sets a strong foundation for mastering form, structure, and rhetorical synthesis. As you engage with timed decision-making drills, remember that moving forward confidently—even when all details aren’t fully unraveled—is a mark of growth, not imperfection. Your steady pace and reflective mindset will help you balance accuracy with efficiency, especially in nonlinear math problems and systems of equations. Trust your instincts during practice and use journaling to reinforce moments when your confident choices lead to success. This phase is about fine-tuning your strengths and embracing progress over perfection. Keep owning your process; your momentum toward 1590 is real and within reach.
